description.hltext_display: Chile To Make Its Oil Company Enap Economically Viable
description.content: SANTIAGO DE CHILE, Dec 22 (BERNAMA-NNN- MERCOPRESS) - Chile wants to make state-owned oil and gas company Empresa Nacional del Petroleo SA (ENAP) "economically viable" through a management overhaul and streamlining of production. In the first nine months of the year, ENAP posted a US$15 million net loss as its Aconcagua and Bio Bio refineries suffered extensive damage and temporarily halted operations because of a massive Feb earthquake. ENAP which managed to turn around a US$958 million loss in full-year 2008 by posting a net profit of US$242 million last year has nearly US$4 billion in accumulated debt. "We want to give the company good corporate governance that will guarantee us that we can avoid past situations, in which the company ended up with debt of US$4 billion and it had poorly managed projects" a spokesman said. ENAP reliance on debt drains the company as it must make interest payments of nearly US$200 million per year, Jorge Matute, the head of ENAP union umbrella organisation said. The company is in the process of reducing costs by cutting 530 workers, or about 15% of its total 3,380 workforce. "We want to watch over the development of the company...so that it is economically viable and complies with its objective, which is to contribute to the development of the nation's energy sector" said Energy Minister Ricardo Raineri The planned changes which include "a more professional board," require legal changes that must be approved by the country's parliament, said Raineri. Enap supplies about 80% of Chile's fuel needs and exports refined products to Peru, Ecuador and Central America. Meanwhile ENAP is seeking joint ventures with foreign companies to explore for crude and gas at five blocks in the country's extreme south region and has invited over twenty corporations to participate, the company said. The Isla Norte, Campanario, Flamenco, San Sebastian and Marazzi-Lago Mercedes blocks represent 12% and 1% of ENAP's proven reserves oil and gas respectively. The area has an estimated 400 drilled wells but only 22 are in production. Under the Chilean joint venture system special contracts, ENAP retains the well and the associate company takes between 30% and 50% of the new oil/gas production. ENAP Magallanes Exploration and Production manager Roberto McLeod said that by the end of April next year the associate-selection process should be concluded. "The association with oil corporations will enable us to begin exploring those areas through the acquisition of 3D seismic surveying and drilling new exploratory wells which if successful could help increase reserves and extraction in the areas" said McLeod. Four basic requisites are demanded from the potential joint-venture associates, proven technical capacity; strong financial backing; reputations and knowledge of basins similar to that of Magallanes region. ENAP said it has found oil at the Marazzi-Lago Mercedes block, but the remoteness and technical challenges associated with the region has prevented the extraction of oil there in Tierra del Fuego. McLeod said ENAP-Magallanes expects that each associate company commits an average investment of US$15 million in each block during the first exploratory phase which basically means seismic surveying and drilling of exploratory wells. In 2008 ENAP which is Chile's top oil refiner and distributor, signed four joint ventures with international firms in Chile's Magallanes region. ENAP is considered a marginal producer of oil with some operations in Argentina and Egypt. -- BERNAMA-NNN-MERCOPRESS

event_or_fact.property: each associate company commits an average investment of US$15 million in each block during the first exploratory phase which basically means seismic surveying and drilling of exploratory wells.

description.hltext_display: 华尔街知名分析师称美国百余城市明年将告破产
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
美国百余城市明年将告破产
金融危机爆发两年多来，美国经济复苏乏力，如今又有坏消息传来，一名华尔街知名分析师日前预测，多达100多个美国城市有可能在明年宣告破产。
华尔街知名分析师梅勒迪丝・惠特尼大胆预测，由于美国各州和大城市的总负债已高达2万亿美元，明年美国可能有100多个城市要宣告破产。新泽西州州长克利斯蒂简短地阐述了问题产生的症结所在，他说，“我们每个名目支出太多，并且疯狂地借贷，让信用过度扩张。这就仿佛过去数十年来我们都在为自己挖掘一个巨大的深坑，现在则必须从这个坑洞里爬出去，但却非常困难。 ”
目前美国各州的开支已比税收超出近5000亿美元，退休基金将面临1万亿美元的资金缺口，许多地方政府被迫大幅削减预算。
（晚报综合报道）

description.hltext_display: 中央年末定调未来楼市商品房保障房双轨并行
description.content:
从不久前闭幕的中央经济工作会议，再到近期各部委密集部署的未来工作要求中不难发现，土地、金融信贷等政策将会进一步趋紧，而楼市调控也将进入常态化阶段。 尤其值得注意的是，随着保障性住房定位的逐渐明晰以及建设力度的加大，我国商品房与保障房的双轨制住房体系正加速建构。 中央经济工作会议： 作为每年最高级别的经济会议，中央经济工作会议首先释放出信号。一方面宏观层面的货币政策开始逐步转向稳健，将进一步收紧市场流动性；另一方面则是对我国的住房体系提出明确要求。这也是近年来中央经济工作会议首次针对住房问题提出工作要求。会议要求强化政府责任，调动社会各方面力量，加大保障性安居工程建设力度，加快棚户区和农村危房改造，大力发展公共租赁住房，缓解群众在居住方面遇到的困难，逐步形成符合国情的保障性住房体系和商品房体系。 央行： 要实施稳健的货币政策，按照总体稳健、调节有度、结构优化的要求，把好流动性这个总闸门，把信贷资金更多投向实体经济特别是"三农"和中小企业，保持经济平稳较快发展。银行业人士表示，这意味着，明年各商业银行的信贷结构可能会有较大的调整，尤其是在房地产信贷方面将会严格控制。 住建部： "十二五"期间我国将加强和改善房地产市场调控，强化市场监管，扎实开展基础性工作。明年，我国计划安排建设保障性住房和各类棚户区改造住房将达1000万套。试点公积金支持保障房建设、减免公租房的税收优惠以及吸引社会资本参与建设等政策措施，将着力解决保障房建设资金难题。 国家发改委： 在部署当前和明年的发展改革工作中提出，落实好房地产调控政策。多渠道增加保障性住房资金投入，落实保障性住房供地和建设计划，鼓励社会资金参与公共租赁住房建设和运营，建立健全保障性住房管理的体制机制。 国土资源部： 正式启动全国土地卫星图片执法检查问责工作，已对部分市县负责人进行约谈。坚定不移地抓好整改查处问责工作,坚决纠正和严肃查处各类违法用地，将用地行为纳入依法规范轨道。 国家统计局： 制定出房价统计改革方案，主要内容涉及房价的数据来源、调查方式、汇总方式、计算方式等，明年初正式使用新的房价统计方法。此前，统计局的房价数据因为与百姓的感受差异过大而饱受质疑。房价统计的改革将会为未来调控楼市提供更精准的参考。 外汇管理局： 加强跨境资金流动监管，积极应对和打击"热钱"等异常跨境资金流动，维护国家涉外经济金融安全。此前住建部和外汇管理局已联合发布"限外令"等楼市重要调控政策。
相关文章：
上一篇文章： 热销楼盘赚得盆满钵满 变相降价业主要求补差价
下一篇文章： 武汉住房公积金新政开始执行 投资炒房将被堵死

description.hltext_display: 'World's first' glasses-free 3D TV hits stores in Japan
description.content:
TOKYO - Toshiba on Wednesday launched in Japan what it calls the world's first television that allows viewers to see 3D images without the need to wear special glasses, amid intensifying competition in the market.
Curious shoppers stopped to test out the screen at an electronics store in central Tokyo as the 12-inch model of Regza GL1 Series went on sale.
The new model with a liquid crystal display carries a price tag of 119,800 yen ($1,400). A 20-inch model will be released on Saturday.
The new 3D TV does not require users to wear special glasses, whereas other 3D-capable models require glasses that act as filters to separate images to each eye to create the illusion of depth.
Toshiba's screens use processing technology to create depth-filled images and the Regza GL1 Series allow users to switch between 2D and 3D on normal TV programs.
Kazuhito Gunji, a public relations official at electronics retailer Bic Camera, said the company had received many inquiries from customers on when they can get their hands on the product.
Electronics stores are hoping that the release of the latest technology will help offset declining sales as government incentives for purchasing environment-friendly home appliances were reduced this month.
The hugely competitive TV sector is a challenge for many electronics makers given that customers are increasingly accustomed to declining prices, making it difficult for the industry to generate profits.
Sony on Monday said it may fall short of its sales goal of 25 million liquid crystal display TV sets this fiscal year as it struggles to be profitable in the sector, and has also embraced 3D TV technology.
Most shoppers were curious but also cautious about the new device on Wednesday, however.
"I want to watch on a big screen," said a 47-year-old man who has a 37-inch TV at home. "I'll wait for another year before buying," he said.
Another customer, 33, said: "It's great that we don't have to wear glasses, which is a nuisance."
"But I didn't feel images were flying out of the screen on some programs," he added.
Toshiba says images on the 12-inch screen are best viewed from the front and some 65 centimeters (26 inches) away.
"Customers currently think of 3D images as just an add-on function... but 3D is expected to become a standard eventually" with 3D films and video titles increasing, said Toshiba sales official Eiichi Matsuzawa.
Rival Sharp earlier this year unveiled a small glasses-free LCD touchscreen that shows 3D images for use in mobile phones, digital cameras and games consoles such as Nintendo's 3DS, to be released in Japan in February 2011.

event_or_fact.property: I'll wait for another year before buying
But I didn't feel images were flying out of the screen on some programs
the company had received many inquiries from customers on when they can get their hands on the product

description.hltext_display: 儋州渔民争购卫星导航设备 90%款项由政府补贴
description.content:
http://news.hainan.net/ 时间：2010-12-22 8:23:00 来源：南海网-海南日报
儋州渔民争购卫星导航设备
全省约6000艘渔船将普及卫星导航系统终端
今天上午10时许，琼儋州11018号渔船的船主符贤进赶到儋州市渔业渔政渔港监督管理处，毫不犹豫地掏出1300元，买走了一台北斗卫星导航系统终端设备。
儋州市渔业渔政渔港监督管理处有关人士告诉海南日报记者，自从琼儋州11166号渔船日前失踪后，前来购买北斗卫星导航系统终端设备的船主明显增多，这个星期卫星导航系统终端设备已经卖了百余台。
北斗卫星导航系统终端设备安装在渔船上，并入海南省海洋渔业安全生产北斗卫星导航通信系统后，渔船和渔船之间，渔船和省、市指挥控制中心能实现随时通讯，无信号盲区。特别是指挥控制中心能准确知道渔船的位置，及时接收到渔船的求救信号。
“装一台在船上，我们有多了一重保险。”符贤进告诉海南日报记者，琼儋州11166号渔船是幸运的，出现机械故障后，又与外界失去联系，给救援增加了难度，拖延了救援时间，所幸没有遇到强大的风浪。如果船主安装了北斗卫星导航系统终端设备，就不会那么久才被找到。
儋州市渔业渔政渔港监督管理处负责人告诉记者，这套终端设备价格为13000元，渔民只需付10%费用，剩下的90%款项由政府补贴。
记者从省海洋与渔业厅获悉，目前该厅正在实施“海南省海洋渔业安全生产北斗卫星导航通信系统工程”，将在全省约6000艘大中型渔船中普及北斗卫星导航系统终端设备，建设省市县联网的指挥控制中心，提高对我省外海作业渔船的动态监控、应急救援和防风救灾管理水平。

description.hltext_display: 東京土産、何を持って帰省しますか？ - 玉木屋さんの…
description.content:
東京生活２年目のくまっくまです。
ＧＷ、夏休み、お盆、正月…帰省の度にお土産に悩みます。
皆様は帰省の際、何を持って帰省しますか？
また喜ばれた東京土産は何ですか？
今まで持って行ったお土産は
●ひよこ、塩ひよこ
●鳩サブレー
●東京ラスク
●聘珍樓の肉包
●東京羊羹
●ねんりん家のバームクーヘン
１週間くらい日持ちのするものを教えて頂けるとありがたいです。
よろしくお願いします。

私も帰省する度に「東京にしかないもの！」と張り切って探しますが、そろそろネタ切れかも。
帰省のお土産だけでなく、最近友人に贈る時にも購入したものは…
●『明治製菓100％ Chocolate Cafe』の日付ごと(味も毎日違う)のチョコレート。
ネット注文もできるので、1月1日のチョコレートも購入可。
●『メサージュド・ローズ』のチョコレート。
薔薇の形のチョコレートは高級感あり。
●『日本橋錦豊琳』のかりんとう。
東京駅地下のグランスタでしか買えない。
行列必至なので、購入される時は時間に余裕を持ってくださいね。
●『あめやえいたろう』の飴(いろいろ)。
カラフルなので見た目もかわいい。
今思いつくのは、こんな感じです。
素敵なお土産が見つかりますように…

n

真空パックのであれば日持ちはバッチリ。
東京駅構内でも売られていますので、新幹線を使うのであれば入手性もGood。
帰省先にもよりますが、東京にこだわらなくてもよいかと。

くまっくま(トピ主)
2010年12月17日 14:32
皆様ありがとうございます。
しいたけさん、パート主婦さん
ご心配ありがとうございます。私の実家は北陸地方なので大丈夫です。
以前テレビで、『ひよこ』は東京と、福岡のどちらが本家かみたいな調査？を見たことがありました。結果は忘れてしまいましたが…。確かに福岡に旅行に行ったときも空港で『ひよこ』が売っていたのを覚えています。
どちらが本家なのでしょうね？
５５１さん
私も『舟和の芋ようかん』大好きです。時々自分用に買って食べています。
あの芋そのもの感がたまらないですよね。
そのほか沢山ありがとうございます。色々読ませていただいていたら、どれもこれも食べたくなってしまいました。
旬なところで、お守りのアドバイス、なるほどと思いました。
地元の婚活中の友達が『そっちって有名な恋愛のパワースポット沢山あるよね？行ってみたいな』と話していたので、喜ばれるかもしれません。
自分では思いつかないアドバイス嬉しいです。

description.hltext_display: Il «piccolo padre» guarda ancora a Mosca
description.content:
Lukashenko non molla la presa sulla Bielorussia Nel Paese dove il tempo si è fermato, le elezioni finiscono sempre allo stesso modo: con la riconferma al potere dell’uomo che ha bloccato l’orologio della storia e con l’opposizione in galera. Cose da Terzo Mondo che succedono non molto lontano da casa nostra, al confine con la Ue, nella piccola Bielorussia dove Lukashenko, l’ultimo dittatore d’Europa sopravvissuto alla caduta del comunismo, si è fatto rieleggere alla presidenza per la quarta volta. Come da copione. L’unica incognita non era il responso delle urne, del tutto scontato, ma la reazione del regime alla protesta di piazza già preannunciata alla vigilia del voto.
C’era chi sperava che Lukashenko, dopo aver governato per sedici anni con pugno di ferro, avrebbe usato guanti di velluto nei confronti di poche migliaia di dimostranti. Invece anche questa volta a Minsk, nella piazza d’Ottobre dominata dalla perenne statua di Lenin, la neve si è macchiata del sangue dei manifestanti, picchiati brutalmente dalla polizia e arrestati insieme con i leader dell’opposizione e i candidati alla presidenza, battuti in senso letterale. «Non è questo il nuovo inizio di cui la Bielorussia aveva bisogno», ha dichiarato il capo degli osservatori dell’Osce tradendo tutta la sua delusione per la mancata svolta.
Sì, c’era più d’uno che ci sperava. Negli ultimi tempi, infatti, Lukashenko era entrato in conflitto con il Cremlino, suo tradizionale alleato e protettore, mostrandosi sensibile ai richiami dell’Unione Europea. I motivi vanno ricercati nella crisi economica sempre più grave che il "piccolo padre" (così, come già Stalin, si fa chiamare il dittatore bielorusso) ha affrontato finora con metodi vetero-sovietici, garantendo stipendi e pensioni ma non lo sviluppo del Paese. Con un’inflazione che quest’anno ha toccato il 10% e un debito pubblico passato da 5 a 25 miliardi in quattro anni, la Bielorussia sopravvive grazie agli aiuti dall’estero. E da quando Mosca ha deciso di aumentare il prezzo del gas e di razionarne il flusso, costringendo Minsk a ridurre le sue esportazioni, Lukashenko si è messo a cercare alternative in ogni direzione, dal lontano Venezuela alla vicina Europa. Ha ricevuto 3 miliardi e mezzo di dollari dal Fondo monetario dopo aver promesso una politica di liberalizzazioni. E la Ue si è detta pronta a erogare un prestito di 3 miliardi di dollari a una Bielorussia che fosse disposta ad avviare un processo di democratizzazione.
Far leva sugli affari non provoca automaticamente dei cambiamenti democratici. Lukashenko gioca su più tavoli ma non dimentica che il banco sta a Mosca. E con un guizzo da vero animale politico, proprio alla vigilia delle elezioni, ha siglato un accordo con il presidente Medvedev secondo cui il Cremlino s’impegna a togliere i dazi sul petrolio inviato in Bielorussia. A sua volta Minsk girerà a Mosca una parte delle entrate dovute all’export del greggio russo. Il tutto per un valore di 4 miliardi di dollari (più di quelli promessi dalla Ue).
Medvedev e il premier Putin continuano a ritenere inaffidabile il dittatore coi baffetti alla Hitler e con la nostalgia di Stalin che governa sulla Russia Bianca. Del resto la tv russa ha definito Lukashenko «mentalmente disturbato». Impresentabile, ma al tempo stesso indispensabile. Così, con grande cinismo, i russi guardano allo zar in miniatura di Minsk. E la Ue deve tristemente prendere atto che la "democratizzazione" della Bielorussia è rinviata a tempi migliori. Il futuro dell’ultimo dittatore d’Europa è sempre nelle mani di Mosca, non di Bruxelles.

description.hltext_display: Milliardjubel på børsen
description.content:
Arbeidende styreleder Øyvind Eriksen og Aker Solutions har solgt unna deler av forretningsområdet P&C, og får varm mottagelse på Oslo Børs. Foto: Roald, Berit
Aker Solutions rett til værs etter storsalg.
Regnskapstall og nøkkelpersoner
Firma/bransje Rollesøk
DAGENS HETE AKSJER
FØLG DINE AKSJER
Meld deg på E24s varslingstjeneste på mobilog få SMS hver gang vi skriver om "dine" selskaper.
Relaterte tema
SISTE BØRSKOMMENTARER
Publisert: 22.12.10 09:23, Oppdatert: 22.12.10 09:53
Kjell Inge Røkkes Aker Solutions stiger til værs på en positiv Oslo Børs onsdag formiddag.
Hovedindeksen sendes opp 0,56 prosent til 437,71 poeng
I sentrum av begivenhetene befinner industrikonsernet Aker Solutions seg. Det skjer etter at det tidligere varslede salget av Aker Solutions` forretningsområde P&C er kommet i havn.
Selger for 5,5 milliarder
Onsdag melder Aker Solutions at det har inngått en aksjekjøpsavtale for å overføre eierskapet i flere av selskapene i konsernets Process & Construction (P&C) forretningsområdet til Jacobs Engineering Group.
Verdien av avtalen som er inngått med Jacobs er estimert til rundt 5,5 milliarder kroner, og salget vil gi Aker Solutions en positiv netto kontanteffekt på omtrent 3,8 milliarder kroner, og den vil frigjøre om lag 4,2 milliarder kroner til morselskapets kontantbeholdning.
Netto resultateffekt i forhold til bokførte verdier er estimert til 2,4 milliarder kroner.
- Prisen er fantastisk
Salget blir godt mottatt blant analytikerne.
- Prisen er fantastisk, er Arctic-analytiker Kjetil Garstads første reaksjon. Andreas Stubsrud i Pareto er helt enig.
- Min umiddelbare reaksjon er at dette ser veldig bra ut. Jeg må regne litt mer på det på grunn av forskjell på salgs- og cash-pris, men uansett er dette svært positivt for Aker Solutions, slår Stubsrud fast overfor Reuters.
Aker Solutions (AKSO)stiger 4,26 prosent til 101,50 kroner.
Jubler for REC
Også solenergiselskapet Rec (REC)får en brakstart på dagen. Selskapet har inngått en toårig salgsavtale for multicrystalline wafers verdt 1,2 milliarder kroner.
Les mer: Storkontrakt til Rec
Avtalen er inngått med en asiatisk produsent av solcellepaneler, og gjelder fra begynnelsen av 2011 til slutten av 2012.
Aksjen stiger 5,26 prosent til 19,20 kroner.
Jefferies tar opp Statoil
Meglerhuset Jefferies tar opp dekning i Statoil-aksjen (STL).
Analytikerne starter med en kjøpsanbefaling og et kursmål på 175 kroner.
Goldman Sachs hever DnB Nor
Analytikerne i meglerhuset Goldman Sachs tar opp kursmålet på en rekke av de nordiske bankene, fremgår det av en rapport, ifølge Reuters.
Kursmålet i DnB Nor(DNBNOR) heves fra 92 til 93 kroner, med en nøytral anbefaling på aksjen.

description.hltext_display: Atea får avtale med Danmark
description.content:
GLADMELDING FRA IT-SELSKAP:
Skal levere datatjenester for over 200 millioner kroner.
Den danske stat har publisert en ny to-års rammeavtale (med mulig forlengelse 1+1 år) vedrørende Microsoft-relaterte tjenester med fem leverandører, hvorav Atea er innstilt som nummer èn.
Dette skriver Atea (ATEA)i en børsmelding.
Rammeavtalen har en estimert totalverdi i fire-årsperioden på mellom 400-440 millioner danske kroner(420-460 millioner kroner).
Atea estimerer verdien av rammeavtalen for Ateas del til 200 millioner danske kroner (211 millioner kroner) i fire-årsperioden.
Rammeavtalen omfatter IT-rådgivning innen foranalyse, installasjon, vedlikehold og annet på Microsoft-programvare på ulike plattformer.
- Atea er valgt som hovedleverandør etter å ha kommet med det beste tilbudet samlet sett, skriver selskapet.

description.hltext_display: Los mercadilleros irán al juez si tienen que levantar los puestos
description.content: Los dueños de los puestos del mercadillo navideño de Arrecife irán en masa al Juzgado si el Ayuntamiento prohibe la actividad, salvo los miércoles y los jueves. No están dispuestos a que se les restrinjan los días de mercadillo, una vez que han pagado su licencia para todas las fiestas.

description.hltext_display: 公民社会失望民联百日新政没恢复地选与废除出版法令
description.content:
没恢复地选与废除出版法令
下午 4点34分
第二届民联大会上公布的“民联议程”完全没提到恢复地方选举的承诺，也没注明要废除1984年出版及印刷法令，招致一群公民社会分子的批评，纷纷表达意外与失望。
在星期天落幕的第二届民联大会上，三党党魁共同推介一份“民联议程”的文件，详细列出执政后欲在国家经济、教育与各个层次落实的改革，包括执政首100日内落实的十大惠民新政。
不过，虽然行动党曾大力推动“还我民主第三票”运动，但无论是整份“民联议程”或精华部分的“十大新政”，都没有提到要恢复地方选举。只有在“三权分立”的部分中，才注明“加强地方政府民主，提升效率及绩效为先，并确保各个层级符合民主的透明度”，含糊带过。
没有承诺还民第三票
良好施政联盟主席玛丽亚陈阿都拉形容，民联议程没列入恢复地方选举的承诺，令大家都感到意外，因为由行动党所主导的槟州政府，在不久前才恫言入禀法庭，以强制选举委员会为民联州属举行地方选举。
她表示，槟州政府这种做法非常好，不管诉讼是赢或输，总之显示公众希望恢复地方选举，没料到的是，“民联议程”却全没提到此事。
本应是308竞选宣言
人民之声活动经理郑文辉也表示意外与失望。他认为，民联本来就把恢复地方选举，列为308大选的竞选宣言之一，但迄今却未能落实。
“他们理应做了足够的研究，以还民第三票。如果民联确实要入主布城，执政中央，就应该把此事列入‘民联议程’中。”
首届地方选举是在1952年举行。1957年马来西亚宣布独立后，地方政府选举还是持续，直至1965年爆发马来西亚与印尼冲突事件后被废除。
只注明修改出版法令
“民联议程”另一项引起诟病之处是，并没有列入废除出版及印刷法令的承诺，反之却只注明要“修改”有关法令。
针对此，独立新闻中心主任马嘉丽查（Masjaliza Hamzah）表示，民联应把废除出版及印刷法令，列入执政100天内应该落实的项目中。
她表示，既然民联早已领受如何被媒体对待，就应该知道要做些事情改正。
她强调此事势在必行，因为许多国家都没有限制媒体的恶法，任由媒体以市场走向来定夺编采方针。
她也建议成立媒体理事会，以容纳各家媒体的代表，进而确保媒体受到公平对待，不再面对任何管制。
在出版及印刷法令下，平面媒体每年都必须更新准证，否则就就算是非法出版。媒体圈都形容，出版法令就犹如套在媒体上的颈圈。

description.hltext_display: GBP/USD Technical Analysis and Strategy 22 December 2010
description.content:
Latest News in Forex
RATE STORY: GBP/USD Open 1.5463 High 1.5569 Low 1.5434 Close 1.5464
On Tuesday Pound/Dollar decreased with around 130 pips, in line with the negative Interbank sentiment at nearly -5%. The Cable depreciated from 1.5569 to 1.5434 yesterday, closing the day at 1.5464. Today the British Pound is slightly adjusting, and it's still moving within yesterday's range. On the 1 hour chart the range trading is breaking downwards, while on the 3 hour chart the downward channel has renewed. First resistance is yesterday's peak at 1.5569. Break above it should extend the bullish movement further towards the 1.5690. The nearest support is yesterday's bottom at 1.5434. Going bellow it should extend British Pound's reduction further down towards next downward objective 1.5312. Today are UK BoE meeting minutes, GDP and Current account, all at 9:30 GMT. Quotes are moving in line with the 20 and bellow the 50 EMA on the 1 hour chart, indicating short term neutral and medium term bearish pressure. The value of the RSI indicator is positive and inclining upwards, MACD is negative and tranquil, while CCI is close with the 100 line on the 1 hour chart, giving overall neutral signals.
Technical resistance levels: 1.5569 1.5690 1.5800
Technical support levels: 1.5434 1.5312 1.5200

description.hltext_display: India may revise taxes for oil sector in budget
description.content:
NEW DELHI, Dec 22 (Reuters) - India may revise customs and excise duties on crude oil and refined products in the budget, if required, finance secretary Ashok Chawla said on Wednesday.
'At this point of time no detailed thinking or discussion on this,' he said, when asked if the federal government planned to reduce customs and excise duties on crude oil and refined products to ease the impact of rising global crude oil prices on domestic retail prices.
(Reporting by Manoj Kumar and Rajesh Kumar Singh; editing by Aradhana Aravindan)
((abhijit.neogy@thomsonreuters.com; +91-11-4178-1006; Reuters Messaging: abhijit.neogy.reuters.com@reuters.net)) Keywords: INDIA TAXES/FUEL
(If you have a query or comment on this story, send an email to news.feedback.asia@thomsonreuters.com)

description.hltext_display: 武汉住房公积金新政开始执行 投资炒房将被堵死
description.content:
昨日是武汉公积金新政执行的第一天，即买二套房首付和利率提高，三套房禁贷。新政实施后对武汉楼市影响有多大？ 武汉市住房公积金中心有关人士说，较之前几天，这几天办理量肯定会大幅减少，因为之前抢着办理很多，但长期影响有多大，要看具体受理情况。 -16家代办银行均开始"把关" 均按新政受理贷款 昨日，记者从光谷、金银湖、盘龙城等地的几处楼盘了解到，驻点各商业银行，确已执行公积金新政，即买首套房首付20%-30%；买二套房首付五成，利率1.1倍；买三套房禁止贷款。 "现在买二套房的市民，严格按新规定执行，三套房已经不受理了。"一银行个贷经理坦言，贷款资料压在手头的很少。 武汉一楼盘经理说，上周末就不再受理公积金贷款业务，因为抢也来不急，退资料很麻烦，干脆就新政实施后受理。 武汉公积金中心介绍，16家代办银行严格按新政"把关"，从20日起，送进窗口的贷款资料一律按新政执行，不符合条件坚决退回。 据悉，购房者有几套房和第几次贷款，均有16家银行代办查询。 -楼市已在"降温" 短期内新政"加速"成交量下滑 眼下，新开的楼盘减少，做促销活动楼盘也不多，买房的人正在减少，各楼盘成交量已经在下降。"公积金新政后，短期内楼市成交量会下降。"后湖一楼盘销售负责人说，新政11月出来，现在才落地，一个月的时间，很多买房者都抢着办了贷款，近几天买房人肯定会减少。 周先生在后湖一楼盘买了套房子，属于三套房，11月5日开始办理贷款，在他的"紧逼"之下，银行一周内就办好了公积金贷款。他说，自己贷款利率还是4.05%，属于基本利率。 据了解，11月3日四部委公布公积金贷款新政后，不少购房者为了赶"末班车"，在购房后，都是催促经办银行办理贷款。 -对自住和改善影响不大 投资炒房将被堵死 公积金新政会不会对后市产生大的影响？武汉公积金中心有关负责人称，公积金贷款占到整个购房贷款的20%左右，对自住和改善限制不多，影响不大。 这位人士还说，用公积金贷款买第三套房的人只占公积金贷款比例2%，份额非常小。同时，买二套房用公积金贷款比商业贷款利率低2.3%，很多人还是会用公积金贷款。 公积金新政实施后，投资客受到限制。因公积金与商贷利率差较大，很多投资客利用公积金贷款购买二套房和三套房。最主要是商业贷款三套禁贷，很多买三套房的人把目标转向了公积金，公积金贷款是投资购房者"避风港"。 在新政执行以后，公积金三套禁贷，二套房1.1倍利率，"堵死"了利用公积金炒房的漏洞。
相关文章：
上一篇文章： 中央年末定调未来楼市商品房保障房双轨并行

description.hltext_display: Scanarc vurderer oppløsning
description.content:
Styret kan selge hele selskapet.
Sinkoksid er den kommersielt viktigste sinkforbindelsen.
Størst forbruk er innen gummiindustrien, der man bruker sinkoksid som akselereringsaktivator ved vulkaniseringen, som fyllstoff og som pigment.
Under navn av sinkhvitt var sinkoksid tidligere det mest brukte hvite malerpigment.
Sinkoksid brukes fremdeles til fremstilling av lakkpigmenter, i grunningsmalinger og sparkelmasser, til fylling av porer og for å hindre soppdannelse.
I tekstilindustrien anvendes sinkoksid til mattering, som resistent for anilinsvart, for å gjøre tekstiler ildsikre m.m.
Dessuten anvendes sinkoksid som katalysator ved metanolsyntesen, til fremstilling av sikkativer, kitt og klebemidler, glasurer og emaljer.
Kilde: Store Norske Leksikon
Regnskapstall og nøkkelpersoner
Firma/bransje Rollesøk
Relaterte tema
Publisert: 22.12.10 09:17, Oppdatert: 22.12.10 09:23
Oslo Axess-selskapet Scanarc (SCAN) skriver i en børsmelding at selskapet «vurderer strukturelle muligheter.»
«Styret har igangsatt en bred prosess for å vurdere strategiske alternativ for Scanarc ASA. Gjennomgangen skal kartlegge alle alternativer, inkludert salg av hele selskapet, salg av eiendeler eller eventuell inngåelse i nye industrielle konstellasjoner,» skriver Scanarc.
Fortsatt utvikling av drift som eget selskapet er ett alternativ, men styrets vurdering er at en strukturell løsning sannsynligvis vil ivareta aksjonærverdiene på en bedre måte.
ScanArc har engasjert ABG Sundal Collier som rådgiver i prosessen.
ScanArcs kjernevirksomhet er produksjon av sinkoksid (se faktaboks) basert på Arcfume-teknologien. Dette foregår i datterselskapet Eras Metal AS' anlegg i Høyanger.
ScanArc anser at Arcfume-metoden har betydelige fortrinn i forhold til etablert teknologi.
De siste månedene har produksjonen av sinkoksyd vært stabil på et historisk høyt nivå (ca 800 tonn sink pr måned i oktober og november).

description.hltext_display: Hafslund selger fibernett
description.content:
Foto: Bendiksby, Terje
Kjøperen må ut med 1,5 milliarder for virksomheten. virksomheten til PE-fondet EQT V, melder selskapet i en børsmelding onsdag.
Dermed overtar kjøperen Hafslund Fibernett AS’ kunder, personell og utstyr.
1,5 mrd.
For dette skal EQT V betale 1477 millioner kroner.
Det gir en gevinst på 900 millioner kroner for Hafslund, opplyser selskapet.
Før det blir en realitet må imidlertid Konkurransetilsynet godkjenne avtalen, noe transaksjonen også er betinget av.
Rendyrking
Den siste tiden har konsernet beveget seg i retning av en tydeligere satsing på utbygging av fornybar energi, samt videreutvikling av infrastruktur for energi. Parallelt med dette vokser Hafslund innenfor strømsalg.
Salget av fibernettvirksomheten bidrar til å rendyrke denne strategien ytterligere, mener selskapet.
- Vi er stolte av den utviklingen Hafslund Fibernett har hatt og selskapet kan i dag skilte med en svært solid markedsposisjon. Vi er glade for å kunne bringe dette selskapet videre inn i en ny vekstfase hos nye eiere, sier konserndirektør for Hafslund Venture, Tore Schiøtz.

description.hltext_display: 10 рязанских дзюдоистов поборются за место в олимпийской сборной России. Обзор спортивных новостей
description.author: RZN.info
description.content:
Дзюдо. За место в олимпийской сборной России поборются 10 рязанцев
В Екатеринбурге с 22 по 27 декабря состоится чемпионат России по дзюдо среди мужчин и женщин. По его итогам будут определены по шесть лучших спортсменов в каждом весе, которым предстоит дальнейшая борьба за олимпийские рейтинговые очки и попадание в сборную России для участия в Олимпиаде-2012 в Лондоне.
Рязанскую область на чемпионате России в Екатеринбурге будут представлять 10 спортсменов: Юлия Котова (57 кг), Александр Москвин (60 кг), Михаил Пуляев (66 кг), Максим Кузнецов (66 кг), Артур Закарян (66 кг), Ольга Усольцева (70 кг), Владислав Филин (81 кг), Юрий Панасенков (90 кг), Андрей Волков (+100 кг и абсолютная категория), Николай Барабанов (+100 кг и абсолютная категория). Стоит добавить, что Котова, Пуляев и Кузнецов уже становились чемпионами России, причем Максиму это удалось сделать дважды.
Лыжи. Рязанский курсант доехал до шестого места
Курсант Рязанской Академии ФСИН Алексей Виценко с результатом 1 час 16 минут 05,2 секунды занял шестое место в персьюте (гонке с «переобуванием» лыж) на 30 км. Всероссийские отборочные соревнования по лыжным гонкам среди молодежи состоялись 19 декабря в Сыктывкаре (Республика Коми).
Стоит отметить, что после первой половины дистанции – 15 км классическим ходом – Алексей Виценко занимал третье место – 41 минута 10,6 секунды. Но затем 19-е время на пит-стопе (31 секунда) и 14-е на 15 км свободным стилем (34 минуты 23,6 секунды) привели к итоговому шестому месту.
Всего в соревнованиях приняли участие 110 человек.
Кроме того, в показательных соревнованиях по русскому жиму лежа хорошо показал себя начальник службы безопасности РГРТУ Николай Милованов, 15 раз толкнувший от груди штангу весом в 100 кг.
Пауэрлифтинг. Студенты РГРТУ размялись перед сессией
В Рязанском государственном радиотехническом университете состоялись соревнования по пауэрлифтингу (силовому троеборью: приседание, жим лежа, становая тяга) за Кубок ректора, в которых приняли участие 33 спортсмена. В результате двухдневной борьбы первые места в своих весовых категориях заняли: Евгений Сизов (до 52 кг), Игорь Синельщиков (до 56 кг), Александр Яичкин (до 60 кг), Александр Шаршуков (до 67,5 кг), Денис Жучков (до 75 кг), Александр Бунин (до 82,5 кг), Дмитрий Христофоров (до 90 кг) и Виталий Синицын (до 100 кг). В командном зачете лучшими стали спортсмены факультета радиотехники (ФРТ).
Кроме того, в показательных соревнованиях по русскому жиму лежа хорошо показал себя начальник службы безопасности РГРТУ Николай Милованов, 15 раз толкнувший от груди штангу весом в 100 кг.

description.hltext_display: El Festival de Música de Canarias ‘pasa’ de la capital
description.content: El Teatro Insular sigue inoperativo, mientras que tampoco se puede usar el auditorio de la Casa de la Juventud. Las posibles alternativas, caso del Castillo de San José o la iglesia de San Ginés, no se consideran adecuadas, con lo que habrá que esperar a 2012 para que la capital tenga algún espacio donde celebrar conciertos. La apertura se hará el 8 de enero en el Convento de Santo Domingo de Teguise, con Trondheim Soloists. Los días 16 y 17 será el turno para The English Concert, en la iglesia de La Graciosa, al ser el punto acorde a la demanda, y La Cueva de Los Verdes. La formación Pagagnini dará el cuarto concierto incluido en el programa, el 29 de enero, en el Teatro de Tías. Por último, los dos recitales finales, previstos para los días 4 y 5 de febrero, correrá a cargo del Cuarteto Particella, en La Graciosa y en la Casa de la Cultura Benito Pérez Armas de Yaiza. Las entradas se pondrán a la venta a través de la mediación del Área de Educación y Cultura del Cabildo, según explicó a este diario su titular, Francisco Cabrera.

description.hltext_display: 阿桑奇称瑞典两名女子乃情敌 醋意大发才告他
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
我来说两句(0)
大中小
大中小
大中小
中新网12月22日电 据台湾“中广新闻网”22日报道，维基解密网站创办人阿桑奇说，控告他性侵的两名瑞典女子是情敌。而她们是因为吃醋才会告他性侵。
阿桑奇遭到两名瑞典女子控告性侵，在英国被捕，目前保释在外，等待引渡去瑞典。
他接受英国电台访问的时候说，这两名女子跟他上床以后担心感染性病，就到警察局去问警察该怎么办。两个人在警局见面发现都跟阿桑奇有染，醋劲大发，才联袂告他性侵。
(责任编辑：赵婷)

description.hltext_display: TGS starter ny seismikkundersøkelse
description.content:
Skal kartlegge basseng utenfor Indonesia.
TGS-NOPEC Geophysical Company idag
» Regnskapstall
» Nøkkelpersoner og roller
Relaterte tema
TGS-Nopec Geo (TGS) skal starte en ny seismisk multiklient 3D-undersøkelse i Tarakan-bassenget, utenfor kysten av Øst-Kalimantan, Indonesia.
Det skriver selskapet i en børsmelding.
Undersøkelsen er den første noensinne for TGS i Indonesia, og skal dekke et område på 1600 kvadratkilometer.
Dataene skal innsamles av fartøyet M/V Seisquest og undersøkelsen vil begynne ved årsslutt.
Salg i første kvartal
Salg av dataene ventes å skje i første kvartal 2011.
TBN10-undersøkelsen skjer i et område hvor det nylig har blitt gjort et gassfunn.
- TGS er spesielt entusiastiske ved annonseringen av dette 3D-programmet, uttaler konsernsjef Robert Hobbs i børsmeldingen.

description.hltext_display: Aker Solutions selger for 5,5 milliarder
description.content:
Selger for 5,5 milliarder
Foto: Simen Grytøyr/VG
Aker Solutions selger konstruksjonsselskaper.
Aker Solutions (AKSO) kunngjorde i august beslutningen om å skille ut P&C forretningsområdet fra resten av Aker Solutions.
For bare to uker siden hadde selskapet kapitalmarkedsdag, og da varslet selskapet at både et nedsalg og en børsnotering kunne bli aktuelt.
Onsdag kom svaret.
Industrikonsernet varsler at det har inngått en aksjekjøpsavtale for å overføre eierskapet i flere av selskapene i konsernets forretningsområde Process & Construction (P&C), til Jacobs Engineering Group Inc.
Aker Solutions konsentrerer seg med dette om virksomhet knyttet til olje- og gassindustrien. Virksomhetene som selges har ingen ansatte i Norge.
Les også: Må vente ett år på oppturen
5,5 milliarder
Verdien av avtalen er estimert til rundt 5,5 milliarder kroner, med forbehold om justeringer ved sluttføring av transaksjonen. Oppgjøret vil skje kontant ved gjennomføring.
Salget vil gi Aker Solutions en positiv netto kontanteffekt på omtrent 3,8 milliarder kroner, og den vil frigjøre om lag 4,2 milliarder kroner til morselskapets kontantbeholdning.
- Aker Solutions kunngjorde i august beslutningen om å skille ut P&C forretningsområdet fra resten av Aker Solutions. Siden da har vi vurdert alternative separasjonsmetoder, inkludert en børsnotering. Etter hvert som de ulike alternativene modnet, fremsto et salg til Jacobs som den beste løsningen både industrielt og finansielt, sier Øyvind Eriksen, arbeidende styreformann i Aker Solutions.
Les også: Milliardjubel på børsen
Mer strømlinjeformet
Eriksen sier at for Aker Solutions er denne avtalen nok et skritt mot å bli enda mer strømlinjeformet og rendyrket mot kjernevirksomheten, som er oppstrøms olje- og gassaktiviteter.
- Med salget av denne virksomheten til Jacobs, og vår nylige beslutning om å overføre Union Construction og EPC Centre US virksomhetene til det nye selskapet Aker Contractors, vil det nåværende P&C forretningsområdet oppløses, sier Eriksen.
- Fremtidens Aker Solutions vil være en rendyrket leverandør av ingeniørtjenester, teknologier, løsninger og servicetjenester for oppstrøms olje- og gassindustrien, sier Øyvind Eriksen.
9. desember fortalte Aker Solutions på sin kapitalmarkedsdag at det vil dele selskapet inn i tre områder, fra dagens fire divisjoner.
Disse er:
1. Ingeniørtjenester innen olje-og gassindustrien (Aker Solutions)
2. EPC-tjenester (Aker Contractors)
3. Ingeniør- og konstruksjonstjenester til industrianlegg på land («P&C International»).

description.hltext_display: Lo sguardo capovolto che scopre l'Invisibile
description.content:
Il Papa e la lezione di Newman C’era una volta un uomo che non escludeva l’esistenza di Dio, ma la considerava come qualcosa di incerto, di non essenziale nella propria vita. Veramente reale, per quell’uomo era solo ciò che è materialmente tangibile. Le cose che si possono prendere e afferrare con la mano: questa soltanto la “realtà”, quella vera. Dio, l’anima, a quell’uomo apparivano idee in cui voleva credere, ma sostanzialmente estranee alla sola categoria del reale: ciò che si può toccare, e misurare.
Quell’uomo era Henry Newman, il teologo inglese convertito al cattolicesimo, da poco beato. In questi termini ha parlato di lui Benedetto XVI, lunedì, concentrandosi sul momento della sua prima conversione. Strano, ti dici leggendo il discorso alla Curia romana, come una questione riguardante un uomo morto 120 anni fa possa essere straordinariamente attuale.
Dunque Newman, prima di convertirsi, era uno che credeva ciò in cui crede “la media degli uomini”, dice il Papa. Dio? Sì, può darsi. Il Dio di molti, credenti e perfino praticanti: ipotesi immateriale, disincarnata. Come un dubbio sospeso, inerte, sulla nostra vita. Dio? Forse, speriamo. Intanto, la realtà autentica è ciò che si tocca: per primo il nostro corpo, impellente nei bisogni. E poi tutto ciò che può essere desiderabile: amore, denaro, sesso, potere e perfino il sapere intellettuale, che forse non si tocca, ma comunque si misura e si usa. Questa è “la” realtà. Poi, parallela ma come separata, c’è la fede. Che è domanda, speranza, magari rifugio nella malattia o nella vecchiaia; ma, insomma, non ha quella consistenza sonante delle cose, quella sovrana indiscutibile evidenza ai sensi.
Cosa succede un giorno a Newman? Improvvisamente, dice il Papa, «riconosce che le cose stanno proprio al contrario: che Dio e l’anima, l’essere se stesso dell’uomo a livello spirituale, costituiscono ciò che è veramente reale, ciò che conta. Sono molto più reali degli oggetti afferrabili».
Immaginiamoci: un giorno un uomo, fino ad allora simile a tutti, vede che la realtà autentica è un’altra. Le cose, forse ora gli sembrano apparenze. Scorge, dietro di loro, mai viste prima, altre colonne originarie, portanti: il Creatore e la creatura - l’uomo, fatto a sua immagine e somiglianza. In un istante un’altra realtà gli si palesa, «più reale degli oggetti afferrabili».
Come un’epifania: l’istante in cui Dio si mostra, sovrano, e dice: Io sono. Una grazia (a lungo domandata). «Svolta copernicana, che cambia la forma fondamentale della vita». Ma perché Benedetto XVI parla in questo Natale della conversione di un uomo di 120 anni fa? Crediamo, perché la cosa ci riguarda. Profondamente. Non siamo anche noi, o almeno tanti di noi, divisi come un giorno Newman? Dio da una parte, e la realtà dall’altra; e il faticoso tentativo di integrare due dimensioni incompatibili. Forse non è così per i più anziani, per quelli cresciuti in una fede semplice, quotidianamente declinata fino dalle preghiere del mattino. Ma in quanti, più giovani, avvertono come sottopelle quella che Benedetto XVI in “Luce del mondo” indica quasi come una “schizofrenia”: la fede come un substrato remoto, che non contagia la vita di ogni giorno. Un Dio che non riusciamo a credere presente, vivo, oggi: sui metrò affollati al mattino, e negli uffici dove si lavora e basta, e dietro le finestre delle nostre case che si illuminano, la sera, nelle città. Ci guardiamo, e ci sembriamo reciprocamente così soli. Questo Newman, invece, che un giorno capovolge lo sguardo, e diventa certo. Prima, era quasi un uomo come gli altri. Potrebbe, dunque, accadere anche a noi?
La “svolta copernicana”, che rende certo ciò che noi riusciamo solo a sperare. Possibile che sia successo a un uomo come noi? Ma perché il Papa ne parla, in questi giorni di vigilia? Forse per suscitare un desiderio. Per indicare il dono – per chi ne ha troppi, e per chi non ne ha nessuno – da domandare davvero, in una notte di Natale.

description.hltext_display: 北京土地成交额创历史新高 业内：有望破1300亿
description.content:
北京市土地中心的公开信息显示，截至昨天，北京今年通过招拍挂公开出让的经营性用地已达234宗，成交金额1145亿元，再创历史新高。而年底前，包括昨天开标的5宗住宅及混合用地在内还将有39宗土地出让，业内人士据此预测，北京今年全年土地成交金额有望突破1300亿元。 市土地中心昨天的最新公开信息显示，从今年的1月7日，中铁房地产集团现场竞价130轮、以19.85亿元拿下丰台区黄土岗居住用地后，到12月17日中铁房地产集团以13.88亿元中标房山区城关街道(圣水嘉名)居住、公建混合项目用地，北京通过土地招拍挂公开出让的经营性用地已达234宗，土地成交金额1145多亿元。 公开信息还显示，包括昨天开标的大兴5宗住宅及混合用地在内，市土地中心还要公开出让39宗经营性用地。"这39宗将在年内以招标或挂牌的方式出让的经营性用地，因为多是以招标的方式出让，因此没法估算它们的出让总底价。但从近10宗挂牌出让的地块看，起始价已过70亿元；以及昨天开标有效的3宗大兴地块报价情况看，北京今年全年土地成交金额突破1300亿元应该不是难事。"业内人士预测。 业内人士提醒：拿地开发商要关注12月19日晚国土资源部发出的《关于严格落实房地产用地调控政策促进土地市场健康发展有关问题的通知》。该通知明确：对凡可能出现"高价地"的地区，必须事前评估，采取有效措施，防止出现高价地，稳定市场预期；对招拍挂出让中溢价率超过50%、成交总价或单价创历史新高的地块，市、县国土资源主管部门要在成交确认书签订(中标通知书发出)后2个工作日内，通过国土资源部门户网站的中国土地市场网页下载并填写《房地产用地交易异常情况一览表》，分别上报国土资源部和省(区、市)国土资源主管部门。
相关文章：
上一篇文章： 武汉住房公积金新政开始执行 投资炒房将被堵死
下一篇文章： 北京市一年查出违法违规用地案近400件

description.hltext_display: LIM's Mine Construction Nearing Completion Plans for 2011 in Preparation
description.content:
Labrador Iron Mines Holdings Limited (TSX:LIM) is pleased to provide an update year-end report on progress at the Company's wholly-owned direct shipping (DSO) iron ore Project in western Labrador, near the town of Schefferville.
Development activities at the mine have progressed substantially since early September and construction is nearing completion. Site operations have now been largely suspended for the Christmas holiday period and will resume in early January 2011.
James Mine ---Site Development
Considerable progress has been made at the James mine site. Most of the James North pit area has been stripped of overburden and cleared. The various ore and waste rock stockpile areas have been prepared, as have the temporary and permanent ore storage pads. The James mine settling ponds have been constructed to enable pit dewatering. The ore haul road from the James Mine to the Silver Yards processing site has now finished.
The mining contractor will return to site in mid January to continue with mine development. During the first quarter of 2011, the first mining bench will be developed in the north end of the James pit to prepare a mining face in the higher grade blue ore, which will be the first ore to be processed. Ore mined from this development, together with the stockpiles of ore from previous bulk sampling programs, will be delivered to the plant ahead of the primary crusher ready for processing. Site clearing and grubbing at the James South pit will also be completed during the winter months. Two additional dewatering wells will be drilled, to supplement the wells drilled in 2009, with pump and piping installation and dewatering of the James pit to commence in the spring.
Mining production operations, using a contractor, are planned to commence in April 2011 and will continue for eight months until November, at an anticipated mining rate starting at 6,000 tonnes of ore per day, increasing to 10,000 tonnes of ore per day, using conventional open-pit mining methods and eventually employing standard drilling and blasting operations.
Plant Construction Substantially Completed
The entire beneficiation and processing plant is now all constructed and erected in place, including the primary and secondary crushers, screens, scrubbers, stackers and conveyers. Other buildings include maintenance and warehouse facilities and site offices. All the civil and concrete work has been finished and the plant piping is substantially complete. The mega-dome roof structure has been delivered to site and erection has been postponed until January to enable the easier installation of some large pieces of equipment. Installation of the electrical cabling will be completed during the first quarter of 2011.
LIM's beneficiation plant has a design capacity to process 10,000 tonnes of ore per day, with a planned initial processing rate of 6,000 tonnes per day, increasing to 10,000 tonnes per day once commissioning is confirmed. The planned annual seasonal processing schedule will cover a period of seven to eight months, approximately 212 to 240 days per year, from April to November, depending on weather conditions.
Transportation and Marketing
Negotiations with the various rail transport companies and port operators have continued but commercial and tariff agreements have not yet been signed. This will be a priority activity in early 2011.
Marketing discussions have continued with potential customers, both in Europe and in Asia, and have indicated an encouraging level of interest in LIM's iron ore. Chinese consumers are showing a growing interest in seeking iron ore from Canada, driven by continued strong demand and a desire to diversify from their traditional sources of supply.
LIM is continuously reviewing a number of options for marketing its planned iron ore production and is evaluating the optimum route to achieve these sales, while still maintaining maximum flexibility and independence. The Company expects to finalize its marketing arrangements early in 2011 to permit sales of the initial ore production to be completed in a timely fashion.
Positive Relations with First Nations
On December 17, 2010, LIM signed an Agreement in Principle with the Innu of Uashat and Mani-Utenam which stipulates the principal terms to be included in a Final Agreement regarding the impacts and benefits of LIM's mining projects to be concluded prior to March 1, 2011.
In September 2010 LIM entered into an Impact Benefits Agreement with the Naskapi Nation of Kawawachikamach with respect to the development and operation of that part of the Schefferville Project in Labrador.
LIM has previously in 2008 entered into an Impact and Benefit Agreement with the Innu Nation of Labrador.
In early September 2010 an agreement was reached with the Innu Matimekush-Lac John to remove the barriers that had been erected in June 2010 and which had restricted normal access from the town of Schefferville to LIM's properties in Western Labrador. LIM is continuing its negotiations with the Innu Matimekush-Lac John towards signing an Impact and Benefits Agreement, and hopes to be able to conclude this IBA early in 2011.
Outlook for 2011
LIM believes that it is on track to commence mining and processing activities in April 2011. Subject to detailed mine planning, the Company currently expects to mine in excess of 2 million tonnes of ore in 2011 which, assuming satisfactory plant commissioning and smooth start-up, and based on projected recoveries of between 70% and 80%, is expected to yield shipments of between 1.5 to 2 million tonnes of iron ore, prior to the seasonal shutdown of operations at the end of November 2011.
Qualified Person
Scientific and technical information disclosed herein has been prepared under the supervision of Bill Hooley, BSc ( Eng), FAusIMM, President, Chief Operating Officer and a Director of the Company who is a Qualified Person within the meaning of NI 43-101.
About Labrador Iron Mines Holdings Limited (LIM)
LIM's Schefferville Area project involves the development of twenty direct shipping iron ore deposits in western Labrador and north-eastern Quebec near Schefferville, Quebec. The Company's properties are part of the historic Schefferville area iron ore district where mining of adjacent deposits was previously carried out by the Iron Ore Company of Canada from 1954 to 1982.
Labrador Iron Mines contemplates mining in four stages, the first phase of Stage 1 comprising the James and Redmond deposits, which are located in close proximity to existing infrastructure, and for which all operating permits have been issued and construction is being completed.
For further information, please view the Company's website at www.labradorironmines.ca
Cautionary Statements:
Some of the statements contained herein may be forward-looking statements which involve known and unknown risks and uncertainties. Without limitation, statements regarding potential mineralization and resources, exploration results, and future plans and objectives of the Company are forward looking statements that involve various degrees of risk. The following are important factors that could cause the Company's actual results to differ materially from those expressed or implied by such forward looking statements: changes in the world wide price of iron ore and steel, general market conditions, the uncertainty of future profitability and access to additional capital, risks inherent in mineral exploration and risks associated with development, construction and mining operations, delays in obtaining or failures to reach agreements with any potentially impacted aboriginal groups or to obtain required governmental, environmental or other project approvals. There can be no assurance that the Company will be successful in reaching any agreement with any First Nations groups who may assert aboriginal rights or may have a claim which affects the Company's properties or may be impacted by the Schefferville Area project. Caution should be exercised on placing undue reliance on forward looking information.

description.hltext_display: 废F级承包商，落实公开招标社青挑战马华翻译文告成巫文
description.content:
社青挑战马华翻译文告成巫文
下午 4点19分
针对马华雪州联委会副财政李万行早前发表，关于槟州水利灌溉局工程100%由马来承包商获标的言论，民主行动党雪州社青团署理团长张晓峰对马华公会在州内扮演反对党的角色的表现感到失望。
因此，张晓峰挑战马华公会：
1. 公开其他国阵执政州过去各项州内政府工程的投标状况。
2. 废除F级承包商必须是土著承包商的条例，并全国落实公开招标政府工程。
3. 把文告翻译成马来文，发表去各语言主流媒体。
仅土著才能获F级承包商执照
张晓峰指出，众所周知，国阵长期执政下，财政部已经明文规定，只有土著承包商才能得到F级承包商的执照。
“马华公会身为国阵政府的其中一分子，不可能不知道这简单的事实。”
“遗憾的是，当家不当权的马华公会明知道事情的根本原因，却不从问题根源着手解决，反而趁乱发表混淆性言论，企图扰人耳目，捞取廉价政治资本。这次事件再一次证明马华的高调问政的本质下还是摆脱不了逃离政治的本性。”
张晓峰再一次促请马华公会，如果不能完成以上三项挑战，就必须公开向槟州政府道歉并协助槟州政府一起解决问题。

description.hltext_display: India Test-Fires Nuclear-Capable Missiles
description.content:
EST
(RTTNews) - India successfully test-fired two nuclear-capable medium range missiles within a span of an hour from the Integrated Test Range at Chandipur in Orissa on Wednesday, say reports.
The surface-to-surface Prithvi-II missiles were launched as part of user trials and were tested for the full range of 350 kilometers.
After a flight duration of about eight minutes, the two missiles zeroed on to their predesignated targets with a high degree of accuracy as they splashed down into the sea.
In September last year, Prithvi-II had failed to take off after its launch.
All the radars, electro-optical and telemetry systems located along the coast tracked the trajectory of the missiles, Defense Research & Development Organization (DRDO) officials said.
Nine-meter-long Prithvi-II is a single stage liquid propelled missile capable of carrying payloads of 500-1,000 kilogram. It had already been inducted into the Indian Air Force.
For comments and feedback: contact editorial@rttnews.com
